items.title: Collaborative Task Creation and Assignment
items.description: Enable users to create tasks, assign them to team members, and set deadlines within shared projects.
acceptance_criteria: User can create a task with title, description, assignee, and due date
Assigned team member receives a notification upon task assignment
Task appears in both creator's and assignee's task lists
dependencies: User authentication and team management module
non_functional: System should handle up to 100 concurrent users without performance degradation
Task creation and assignment actions should complete within 2 seconds

items.title: Real-time Task Status Updates
items.description: Provide real-time updates to all team members when a task's status changes.
acceptance_criteria: Task status changes are reflected in all connected clients within 2 seconds
Users receive a notification when a task they are assigned to changes status
non_functional: System should support WebSocket or similar real-time protocol
Updates should not exceed 1 second latency under normal load

notes: User request was broad; assumed core collaboration features include task creation, assignment, and real-time updates. Additional features like file sharing, comments, and integrations may be defined later.
